mapper.sql: VITAL_STATISTIC_ID, PERSON_ID, COMPANY_ID, PHYSICAL_HEIGHT, PHYSICAL_WEIGHT, SHOULDER_WIDTH, CHEST_WIDTH, WAIST_WIDTH, SPHERE_LEFT, SPHERE_RIGHT, CYLINDER_LEFT, CYLINDER_RIGHT, BIFOCAL_LEFT, BIFOCAL_RIGHT, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from PEA_VITAL_STATISTICS
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
select PEA_VITAL_STATISTICS_S.nextval from dual
insert into PEA_VITAL_STATISTICS (VITAL_STATISTIC_ID, PERSON_ID, COMPANY_ID, PHYSICAL_HEIGHT, PHYSICAL_WEIGHT, SHOULDER_WIDTH, CHEST_WIDTH, WAIST_WIDTH, SPHERE_LEFT, SPHERE_RIGHT, CYLINDER_LEFT, CYLINDER_RIGHT, BIFOCAL_LEFT, BIFOCAL_RIGHT, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE ) values (#{vitalStatisticId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{personId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{physicalHeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{physicalWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shoulderWidth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{chestWidth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{waistWidth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sphereLeft,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sphereRight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cylinderLeft,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cylinderRight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bifocalLeft,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bifocalRight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update PEA_VITAL_STATISTICS
VITAL_STATISTIC_ID = #{record.vitalStatisticId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PERSON_ID = #{record.personId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMPANY_ID = #{record.companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PHYSICAL_HEIGHT = #{record.physicalHeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PHYSICAL_WEIGHT = #{record.physicalWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update PEA_VITAL_STATISTICS set VITAL_STATISTIC_ID = #{record.vitalStatisticId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PERSON_ID = #{record.personId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMPANY_ID = #{record.companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PHYSICAL_HEIGHT = #{record.physicalHeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PHYSICAL_WEIGHT = #{record.physicalWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SHOULDER_WIDTH = #{record.shoulderWidth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHEST_WIDTH = #{record.chestWidth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WAIST_WIDTH = #{record.waistWidth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SPHERE_LEFT = #{record.sphereLeft,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SPHERE_RIGHT = #{record.sphereRight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CYLINDER_LEFT = #{record.cylinderLeft,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CYLINDER_RIGHT = #{record.cylinderRight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BIFOCAL_LEFT = #{record.bifocalLeft,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BIFOCAL_RIGHT = #{record.bifocalRight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_BY = #{record.createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATION_DATE = #{record.creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{record.lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{record.lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update PEA_VITAL_STATISTICS
PERSON_ID = #{personId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

PHYSICAL_WEIGHT = #{physicalWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where VITAL_STATISTIC_ID = #{vitalStatisticId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update PEA_VITAL_STATISTICS set PERSON_ID = #{personId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PHYSICAL_HEIGHT = #{physicalHeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PHYSICAL_WEIGHT = #{physicalWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SHOULDER_WIDTH = #{shoulderWidth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHEST_WIDTH = #{chestWidth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WAIST_WIDTH = #{waistWidth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SPHERE_LEFT = #{sphereLeft,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SPHERE_RIGHT = #{sphereRight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CYLINDER_LEFT = #{cylinderLeft,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CYLINDER_RIGHT = #{cylinderRight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BIFOCAL_LEFT = #{bifocalLeft,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BIFOCAL_RIGHT = #{bifocalRight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where VITAL_STATISTIC_ID = #{vitalStatisticId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
